summary: Embalming Tools Found in Tombs Can be used As Weapons!!!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36503-1-1369756845.jpg[/img]
Hey Guys,
This is part of a number of mods i am going to make, where little things around skyrim which have no use will be given, a use.


this is just a mod i made, where you can use the Embalming Tools as weapons.
stats are similar to Ebony Dagger.
they are craftable at a forge,(under Ebony).
*actually you cant fight with the ones found in tombs(they are MISC item, you have to go to forge and convert it to Weapon.
There are two recipes for each, one recipe is using ebony and leather, the other is using the corresponding MISC item.
next i am going to do embalming tools.\'
*******DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND, I HAVE ADDED AN OPTIONAL FILE WHICH ADDS THE WEAPONS TO  CALIXTO CORRUM aka the serial killer of windhelm*********
author: Daren
